categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A male Jedi Knight served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic during the Republic Classic era.

A Force-sensitive, this individual was trained in the ways of the Force by the Jedi Order, eventually achieving the rank of Jedi Knight. Active in the year 340 BBY, he was attacked by a group of pirates on a mission for the Jedi High Council. Reporting back to the Coruscant Jedi Temple, this individual filed an official report with the current Grand Master of the age.

Long after this Jedi's time, a recording of his meeting with the Grand Master was discovered to have survived the Great Jedi Purge of 19 BBY. Rescued from the Temple by the Last Curator of Records, the files were viewed by Luke Skywalker while rummaging through the Curator's belongings.
